project1.title: Pinteresting With Davis
project1.description: This project is a mock Pinterest App, where the user can complete full CRUD on multiple collections using Firebase for as our database.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML5, SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, ES6 Modules, JQuery, Firebase

project2.title: Chatty Messanger
project2.description: Chatty Messanger is an app that allows seperate users to message one another, delete messages, search and post gifs, all on this online forum type page.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML5, SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, ES6 Modules, JQuery

project3.title: My Pet Adoption Service

project4.title: La Baguette Resturant Monitoring App
project4.description: This App allows the resturant to keep track of employees, reservations, inventory and recipes among other things.
